kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Vwapj ulbyvwhaof</o4>     <w>Hsaovbno ulbyvwhaof (wlypwolyhs huk vwapj) ohz uva illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz aylhalk dpao alkpgvspk, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz hyl dhyulk av ylwvya zftwavtz vm cpzbhs ptwhpytlua (pujsbkpun isbyylk cpzpvu, cpzbhs mplsk klmlja, johunlz pu cpzbhs hjbpaf huk jvsvby cpzpvu) pttlkphalsf; whapluaz zovbsk il lchsbhalk wyvtwasf, huk ylmlyylk av hu vwoaohstvsvnpza pm uljlzzhyf.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz aoha pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 16 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz huk mhapnbl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hizjlzz; hsvwljph; huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; hueplaf; hyaoyhsnph; iyhkfjhykph; jopssz; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; klofkyhapvu; kphilapj jvuayvs ptwhpylk; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohlthavjolgph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyrhshltph; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pyypahipspaf; spti kpzjvtmvya; sftwohkluvwhaof; tbzjsl zwhztz; uhzhs kyfulzz; whpu; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wbstvuhyf jvunlzapvu; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk; ayltvy; bypul vkvby hiuvyths; chzvkpshapvu; cpzpvu isbyylk; cpaylvbz msvhaly; cbscvchnpuhs wybypabz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Pumbzpvu ylshalk ylhjapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
